definition: acrylic (loanword)/see also 亞克力|亚克力[ya4 ke4 li4]
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: The acryl bottle opener, the refrigerator stick, the cup mat etc. product.
sentences.chinese: 压克力开瓶器，冰箱贴，杯垫等产品。

sentences.english: Preparing the canvas for painting with acrylics involves applying a layer of gesso on the surface as a foundation.
sentences.chinese: 准备压克力画在画布上应用涉及面为基础的石膏层。

sentences.english: Main products of the company are PMMA fruit plate.
sentences.chinese: 是一家以生产压克力为主的企业。

sentences.english: Baking enamels for truck, bus and car.
sentences.chinese: 卡车，巴士，汽车用压克力烤漆。

sentences.english: Han soon discovered that the acrylic panel could also serve as a diffusion screen;
sentences.chinese: 不久后，汉恩发现压克力板也可当做扩散屏幕使用。

sentences.english: Snare drums may be made from various wood, metal, or acrylic materials.
sentences.chinese: 小鼓，可制成各种木材，金属，压克力材料。

sentences.english: The Acryl Eye can not be changed to the Glass one…
sentences.chinese: 的压克力眼不能改变的玻璃。

sentences.english: Lacquers for metals, electroplates and plastic.
sentences.chinese: 金属，电镀制品，塑胶等压克力喷漆。

sentences.english: Acrylic lacquer for metal, aluminum electroplates, Christmas decoration.
sentences.chinese: 金属，铝电镀装品，圣诞花果工艺品等压克力喷漆。

sentences.english: Acrylic lacquer for wood, metal, plastic, Cane-work.
sentences.chinese: 木工，金属，塑胶，藤器等压克力喷漆。

definition: acrylic (loanword)/see also 壓克力|压克力[ya1 ke4 li4]
bakelite (early plastic)/also written 膠木|胶木[jiao1 mu4]
intaglio printing plate (or a print made with it)
